word:
The most successful methods are to encourage 
                                                                           63
families who have a missionary spirit, to settle in the Southern States, and work with the people. [MS., NOV. 20, 1895. PUBLISHED IN BOOKLET, "THE SOUTHERN WORK," PP. 100, 101, 103, 104, UNDER HEADING, "PROPER METHODS OF WORK IN THE SOUTHERN FIELD."]
